name: bridge
description: This project was bootstrapped with Fastify-CLI.

scripts.test: pnpm run build:ts && tsc -p test/tsconfig.json && cross-env FASTIFY_AUTOLOAD_TYPESCRIPT=1 node --test --experimental-test-coverage --loader ts-node/esm test/**/*.ts
scripts.start: pnpm run build:ts && fastify start -l info dist/app.js
scripts.dev: pnpm run build:ts && concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "TypeScript,App" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold" "pnpm run watch:ts" "pnpm run dev:start"
scripts.dev:start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development fastify start --ignore-watch=.ts$ -w -l info -P dist/app.js
